title: Cloud card
data:
{{version025}} {{Flavour|The card depicts an iron gate enshrouded in mist.}} The Cloud card surrounds all hostile monsters in sight with opaque [[cloud]]s of black smoke, with average duration depending on power level: *Power level 0: 5 turns *Power level 1: 8 turns *Power level 2: 11 turns The smoke initially covers every hostile creature in view and all tiles adjacent to them, then begins to drift. Note that this is not guaranteed to break line of sight to a lone target. [[Deck of escape|Escape]] !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of escape|Escape]] |---- |} ==See also== *[[Cards]] *[[Decks]] ==History== * Prior to [[0.25]], the Cloud card surrounded enemies with a variety of damaging clouds instead of smoke. * In the simplification of decks in [[0.19]], the Cloud card was one of 23 cards to be kept, now appearing only in the deck of escape. * Prior to 0.16, it would simply disperse a number of flame clouds or freezing vapours anywhere in sight (except ontop of players and allies), the number dependent on card power level. * The Cloud card was introduced in [[0.15]] as a repurposing alteration of [[Flame card|the Flame]] card, which was eliminated. * In [[0.15]] the cloud card used to surround enemies with clouds of either fire or cold. {{cards}} [[Category: Deck]]
